general_perception.description and explanation:
The traffic image reveals multiple road users and objects affecting driving behavior. Firstly, there is a large truck with a green tarp situated on the left side of the ego car, either stationary or moving slowly due to the red traffic lights. This truck may impede the ego car's ability to maintain speed or change lanes if it continues to move slowly or remains stationary. Directly in front of the ego car in the same lane, a white SUV-like vehicle is also stationary or moving slowly, requiring the ego car to maintain a safe following distance and prepare to stop or adjust speed accordingly.

Several red traffic lights are visible, indicating that the ego car must come to a full stop and wait for the lights to turn green before proceeding. Orange traffic cones are placed between lanes, suggesting lane closures or roadworks ahead. This necessitates potential lane changes or navigation through a reduced lane width, demanding the ego car's attention and maneuvering.

Additionally, there is a yellow construction vehicle with an extended crane arm positioned beyond the traffic lights on the right. This points to ongoing construction or road work, which could affect traffic flow and require the ego car to anticipate sudden stops or detours.
